Display keyboard on start Enable autocomplete/suggestions Hide history and intro screen, enable widgets Minimalistic UI Show history on touch Force portrait mode Send touch events to wallpaper Emulate drag event for wallpaper Send multiple touch events Scroll wallpaper Drag horizontally to scroll wallpaper Hide app icons Useful on slow devices Select web search providers Regenerate all app shortcuts Delete web search providers Add web search provider Reset web search providers Default web search provider on enter Would you like to reset the list of search providers? History mode Select the way that the history is populated If available use it to hibernate apps Root mode Unable to gain root privileges. Freeze history Are you sure you want to freeze history and turn off further updates? Your history will not change anymore.

Fix theme issues and new contacts not displaying Restart Zen Launcher Do you really want to restart Zen Launcher? If Zen Launcher is not your default launcher the app will simply quit.
Change Default Launcher After selecting the Default Launcher, you\'ll be sent to its home screen. Are you sure you\'d like to proceed?\n\nNote: If you don\'t see the \"Always\" option, press the \"Home\" button after selecting your desired launcher.

Permission has been denied Colors Black notification icons Display notification bar icons in black Zen is not your main launcher anymore and can\'t access your shortcuts. Unable to add shortcuts (shortcut provider is disabled in Zen settings)
Show hide-tags bar Customize tags bar Tags to show on bar Tags to show in fav bar Zen Menu Enable tags menu Show all matching Available tags Available actions Show history Center desktop background The desktop background will return to the center after moving the screen Side to which the desktop background will be drawn The desktop background will be drawn left or right after scrolling the screen Show untagged Show untagged action Enable gestures on empty areas (↑ for keyboard, ↓ for notifications) Display a dot on apps with notifications Check Zen Launcher in the following menu to turn it on.
